5d5fe002-1abe-4bdc-9410-41bf239d8450.name: Air Fitting Supporters for LinkBuds Fit | Pure Black
features: Enhance your LinkBuds Fit experience with Air Fitting Supporters in a variety of mix-and-match colors.1,2.

Select your favorite premium matte color from five options: Ash Blue, Ash Green, Ash Violet, Ash Pink and Pure Black. These air fitting supporters are easy to swap and with a stable fit, you can customize to complement your style1,2.

Your air fitting supporters will arrive in packaging that matches the color you selected. The packaging is made with sustainable material, reflecting our commitment to minimizing the environmental impact of our products3.

Sony is committed not only to offering products, services and content that deliver exciting experiences but also to working towards our goal of a zero environmental footprint throughout our business activities.
